meanings.sent1: The tourbillions of leaves danced in the wind.

meanings.definition: A whirl or eddy of water.
meanings.sent1: The stream formed small tourbillions as it flowed over the rocks.
meanings.sent2: The whirlpool created tourbillions of foam on the surface.
meanings.sent3: The tourbillions in the bathtub made bath time more fun.
meanings.sent4: The boat was caught in a tourbillions of currents, spinning it around.
meanings.sent5: The tourbillions of water in the river sparkled in the sunlight.
